Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

AP AC/2 Ammo Bins each contain 22 rounds and may feed multiple weapons.

Armor Piercing rounds do a single damage to internal structure even through armor. This can potentially mean internal components are damaged. AP Ammo however, has -1 accuracy.
